address.street: Carr a las Tablas de Daimiel

title: (13250) Daimiel - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area in the natural park of Daimiel. Green Zone. Possibility of walks and bike. Ask permission to park information or the guardian. Free. No service available. Toilets in the House of the Park during opening hours.

title: (13640) Herencia - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in picnic area. Many tables. Plenty of parking space shaded by pine trees. We have spent the night very comfortable...

title: (13750) Castellar de Santiago - 48 Calle Bailén
description: Unattended AC's area, with all payment services by bank card. Created by the Provincial Council of Ciudad Real. Located next to the bullring.

title: (13650) Puerto Lápice - 58 Calle Calatrava
description: New municipal motorhome area of Puerto Lapice, next to the civil guard, with all services, within the town, 5 minutes walk from the square, views of the mills and the beginning of the route to visit the hermitage of San Isidro, several bike routes, and walking you can go up to the mills, from where you can see the entire region of la mancha.

title: (13650) Puerto Lápice - 2 Calle Sierrecilla
description: Free service area. Caterer and shops 500 m away, in the center of the village. Easy access because well indicated by signs. View of the Mills. Be careful with clean water tap on the left when entering the area.

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - Unnamed Road
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to the windmills. Picnic area next, with benches and garbage cans. There is a fount. Quiet and secluded area with views of the city.

title: (13650) Puerto Lápice - Unnamed Road
description: Place near the mills of Puerto Lapice, about 300m approximately, the place is fairly well leveled, the views are magnificent, in the town there is a gas station and it is near, without limit of height and width by the access road to the place circulates agricultural machinery, a perfect place to stop in your travels

title: (13640) Herencia - 44 Avenida Alcázar
description: Beautiful view

title: (13640) Herencia - Carretera Herencia
description: Platform to the mills

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - Unnamed Road
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - Unnamed Road
description: Next to the antenna, going up through the cemetery and water tank. Large space with pine trees and excellent views of the hill of the mills and the town of Alcázar de San Juan.

name: Área autocaravanas | Carrefour Alcázar de San Juan
title: (13600) Área autocaravanas | Carrefour Alcázar de San Juan
title_short: (13600) Área autocaravanas | Carrefour Alcázar de San Juan
description: Area with all services at the end of the Carrefour car park, all new and perfectly functional. Free, many thanks to the Carrefour store. There is a laundry room. Maximum stay 72 hours.

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 5 Carretera San Isidro
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 5 Carretera San Isidro
description: Cerro and Ermita de San Isidro Easy access by track, plots of land, quite shade, there are bathrooms but are usually closed. Close to all the services of the town. Nice views of Campo de Criptana and the beautiful Manchego sunset. You can walk up to the top of the hill.

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 1D Calle Tomelloso
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 1D Calle Tomelloso
description: Area managed by the city council, it is located in a central area.

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 22 Calle Rondilla Cruz Verde
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 22 Calle Rondilla Cruz Verde
description: Good utility room for washing clothes and close to town centre.

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 262 Calle Pj Veguilla
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 262 Calle Pj Veguilla
description: Meadow of the Route of the Quijote, to the entrance of the Complex Lagoon of Alcázar de San Juan, ideal place for the observation aquatic birds, mainly flamingos. It has good access and has two picnic areas with shade. Only bad point that if it is very hot there is a bad smell because the purifier is next to it.

title: (45720) Autovía Madrid-Andalucia Km.132 -
description: Reception area for caravans and motorhomes with large space to spend the night in a short and long period of time. With running water supplies, discharges of gray and black water.

name: Area Autocaravanas De Campo De Criptana
title: (13610) Area Autocaravanas De Campo De Criptana
title_short: (13610) Area Autocaravanas De Campo De Criptana
description: From Alcazar de San Juan and Mota del Cuervo it is reached by the N-420. Once in the town center, follow the signs for the sports area. The area is located near an industrial park and the sports center. Authorized stay, 48 hours. Nearby there is a park, a restaurant, shops, gas station and public swimming pools (in season).

title: (13610) Campo de Criptana - 9 Calle Barbero
description: Parking near the windmills that you can visit inside for a small fee. You will be explained how it works. Beautiful view of the village.
